Sam Bankman-Fried Implied His Friends Lied About His Role in FTX's Collapse https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/10/30/sam-bankman-fried-implied-his-friends-lied-about-his-role-in-ftxs-collapse/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign =头条新闻MJHVNBDOE5AS3CWS73XHRI4WIE Nikhilesh DeSam didn't do it. He didn't defraud anyone, he didn't steal customer funds – he just built a company which "turned out basically the opposite" of the product he envisioned when he founded FTX: "A lot of people got hurt – customers, employees – and the company ended up in bankruptcy."
